LanguageData.JRWKentrosaurus.label: Kentrosaurus
LanguageData.JRWKentrosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03728-1915 [KENTROSAURUS AETHIOPICUS] CODENAME: SPEAR >369
A 'primitive' stegosaurian dinosaur that sports a deadly tail covered in spikes. While not quick to turn, these dinosaurs have often wielded their tails efficiently in combat, slicing and piercing attackers.
LanguageData.JRWKentrosaurus.tools.tail.label: tail
